hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_PUSH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Flag to indicate that successful builds should be pushed to the selected docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the Docker Registry Account

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Email Address for the Docker Registry Account

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +e TAG=$(git describe --tags --exact-match) if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then HAS_TAG=true else HAS_TAG=false fi HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) BRANCH_NAME=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}
set -e
sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/plone:4.3.7-$HASH sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/plone:"4.3.7-${BRANCH_NAME}-latest"
if [ $HAS_TAG = true ]; then sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/plone:4.3.7-$TAG if [ $BRANCH_NAME = "master" ]; then sudo docker tag -f jenkins_visualiser ${DOCKER_REGISTRY}/bccvl/plone:latest fi fi
